text:
John Forslund (born February 14, 1962) is an American television presenters and announcer. He is the television play-by-play announcer for the Carolina Hurricanes. He has been with the team since 1991 (when the team was the Hartford Whalers) and has been calling games since 1995. Forslund was born in Springfield, Massachusetts.
On March 13, 2020, Forslund is tested positive to the COVID-19..
